members.comment: Constructs a new NoRouteToHostException with the specified detail message as to why the remote host cannot be reached. A detail message is a String that gives a specific description of this error.
Construct a new NoRouteToHostException with no detailed message.

name: java.net.NoRouteToHostException
comment: Signals that an error occurred while attempting to connect a socket to a remote address and port. Typically, the remote host cannot be reached because of an intervening firewall, or if an intermediate router is down.
